query.q: L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(MAX(`sum_timer_wait`) AS `{{.Dashboard.cost}}`) { `index` = 'default' and ( `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' ) } BY `schema_name`
L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(COUNT(`*`) AS `{{.Dashboard.sql_number}}`) { `index` = 'default' and ( `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' ) } BY `schema_name`
L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(MAX(`sum_timer_wait`) AS `耗时`) { `index` = 'default' and ( `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' and `message` = re('SELECT.*') ) } BY `schema_name`
L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(COUNT(`*`) AS `SQL 总数`) { `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' } BY `schema_name`
L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(MAX(`count_star`)) { `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' } BY `schema_name`
L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(MAX(`sum_lock_time`) AS `最长锁时间`) { `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' } BY `schema_name`

L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(MAX(`sum_timer_wait`) AS `{{.Dashboard.cost}}`) { `index` = 'default' and ( `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' and `message` != re('set*') and `message` != re('show*') ) } BY `digest`

L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(COUNT(`message`) AS `SQL`) { `index` = 'default' and ( `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' and `message` != re('set*') and `message` != re('show*') ) } BY `digest`

L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(LAST(`sum_lock_time`) AS `{{.Dashboard.lock_time}}`) { `index` = 'default' and ( `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' and `message` != re('set*') and `message` != re('show*') ) } BY `digest`

L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(LAST(`sum_no_index_used`) AS `{{.Dashboard.no_index}}`) { `index` = 'default' and ( `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' and `message` != re('set*') and `message` != re('show*') ) } BY `digest`

L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(LAST(`sum_no_good_index_used`) AS `{{.Dashboard.no_good_index}}`) { `index` = 'default' and ( `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' and `message` != re('set*') and `message` != re('show*') ) } BY `digest`

L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(LAST(`sum_select_scan`) AS `{{.Dashboard.select_scan}}`) { `index` = 'default' and ( `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' and `message` != re('set*') and `message` != re('show*') ) } BY `digest`

L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(LAST(`sum_select_full_join`) AS `{{.Dashboard.select_full_join}}`) { `index` = 'default' and ( `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' and `message` != re('set*') and `message` != re('show*') ) } BY `digest`

L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(SUM(`count_star`) AS `{{.Dashboard.query_count}}`) { `index` = 'default' and ( `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' and `message` != re('set*') and `message` != re('show*') ) } BY `digest`

L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(LAST(`create_time`) AS `{{.Dashboard.create_time}}`) { `index` = 'default' and ( `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' and `message` != re('set*') and `message` != re('show*') ) } BY `digest`
L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(MAX(`sum_timer_wait`) AS `耗时`) { `index` = 'default' and ( `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' and `message` = re('INSERT.*') ) } BY `schema_name`
L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(COUNT(`*`) AS `querys`) { `index` = 'default' and ( `message` = re('SELECT*') and `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' ) } BY `schema_name`
L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(COUNT(`*`) AS `inserts`) { `index` = 'default' and ( `message` = re('INSERT*') and `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' ) } BY `schema_name`
L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(COUNT(`*`) AS `updates`) { `index` = 'default' and ( `message` = re('UPDATE*') and `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' ) } BY `schema_name`

L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(COUNT(`*`) AS `OTHERS`) { `index` = 'default' and ( `message` != re('UPDATE*') and `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' and `message` != re('INSERT*') and `message` != re('SELECT*') ) } BY `schema_name`
